intro.title: Full Stack Developer with Cybersecurity Focus
intro.text: Graduated in Computer Science in June 2024 and currently pursuing a Master's in System Security and Infrastructure,  currently deepening skills in network defense, ethical hacking, and security auditing. I am a person who is always searching for the best solution, learning new thing and try to do my best at every task.Looking for an internship in cybersecurity/offensive security/SOC/pentesting. I am ready to take on new challenges and bring real value to your company.

cards.description: Intelligent system to detect available parking spots from captured images. Training a deep learning model to identify free spaces. Technologies: Python, OpenCV,

Web application for managing invoices, client records, and consultations. Implementation of an online appointment booking system. Hosted and deployed on Hostinger. Continuous maintenance and improvements. Technologies: ReactJS, Laravel, MySQL, Git.

E-commerce platform to automate orders and improve customer experience. Integration of an NLP (Natural Language Processing) module to personalize product recommendations. Technologies: ReactJS, Laravel, MongoDB, Flask, Scikit-learn, Git
Performance analysis of Lionel Messi against Real Betis. Dynamic and responsive visualizations. Technologies: Python
Web application displaying Euro 2024 statistics in real time. Technologies: Python, Streamlit
Player performance rating model based on statistical criteria. Visual presentation of results in a table. Technologies: Python, Pandas, Scikit-learn, Matplotlib.

Project based on the Frontend Mentor challenge "Little Lemon." Creating a restaurant interface with menu, reservation, and contact. Focused on responsive design and modularity. Technologies: ReactJS, CSS.

Simulated cinema seat reservation application. Interactive interface allowing users to choose and book seats. Uses JavaScript for logic and DOM for dynamic display. Technologies: HTML, CSS, JavaScript.

education.title: Education
degrees: Master's in Systems Security and IT Infrastructure (SS2I)
Bachelor's in Software Engineering and Information Systems (GLSI) with Honors
High School Diploma in Computer Science with High Honors
descriptions: Specialized training in cybersecurity, system administration, and digital risk management. Acquired advanced skills in protecting IT infrastructures and sensitive data.
In-depth program in software development, system architecture, and artificial intelligence. Expertise in programming, databases, and robust application design.
Foundations in algorithms, programming, and applied mathematics. Introduction to fundamental concepts of computer systems and networks.

cards.description:
Design and development of a web application for managing invoices, client records, and consultations.
Implementation of an online appointment booking system to enhance user experience.
Hosting and deployment on Hostinger.
Ongoing maintenance: bug fixes, performance optimization, and addition of new features based on client needs.
Technologies: ReactJS, Laravel, MySQL, Git

Development of an e-commerce platform to automate orders.
Integration of an NLP module to personalize product recommendations.
Technologies: ReactJS, Laravel, MongoDB, Flask, Scikit-learn, Git

Organization.medianet: MEDIANET is a Tunisian agency specializing in digital marketing and digital transformation. Founded in 1998, it has established itself as a key player in assisting businesses towards digitalization, both in Tunisia and internationally.
Organization.medicapet: MedicaPet is a veterinary clinic located in La Marsa, Tunisia. It offers a comprehensive range of medical services for pets, including internal medicine, surgery, vaccination, and emergency care. The team consists of veterinarians graduated from the National School of Veterinary Medicine of Sidi Thabet, assisted by a qualified assistant and experienced staff
